void lockTable (int semx, int block, S_TABLE **tableS)
 It decides if it has to lock the table or wait for the opponent. Peform semaphore wait/notifies: ARGUMENTS: semx 0 : table lock semaphore 1 : opponent notify semaphore block 0 : perform notify 1 : perform wait.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void lockTable ( int  semx,
int  block,
S_TABLE **  tableS 
)

It decides if it has to lock the table or wait for the opponent. Peform semaphore wait/notifies: ARGUMENTS: semx 0 : table lock semaphore 1 : opponent notify semaphore block 0 : perform notify 1 : perform wait.

Parameters:
semx It is the parameter to decide what have to do with semaphore
block It decides what have to do with the table
tableS The adress of the table.
